title: Brace.ai: Stavvy
role: Front-end tech leadership & Senior Software Developer
description: Brace was a software-as-a-service (saas) technology provider whose focus was in the mortgage servicing space. It is an end-to-end mortgage servicing software for loss mitigation.   Over four years, I  participated in all aspects of product development lifecycle from planning through execution. I was responsible for developing and maintaining the front-end of each application, working closely with the design team to create seamless user experiences.

title: Cayor Capital
description:
Cayor Capital launched in 2015, as a Sub-Saharan Africa equity fund, focusing on mid-market assets and investments. Upon reaching their investment goal, Cayor required a website update. I worked with the Cayor team to design and develop and maintain thier new, responsive single page app to attract future investments.
 My approach to Cayor was to advocate for a fresh, updated interface that put the investors and portfolio companies first. To make the site user-friendly, we focused on breathing life into the Company decks and transforming the details into designed pages.

title: Aeroasis
description: Aeroasis was a resource autonomy startup with a strong focus on education.  Aeroasis flagship product was an IoT indoor home garden system that combined innovative technology with intuitive mobile design to seamlessly grow produce.
